Thomas Tuchel will be offered a contract extension by Chelsea at the end of his 18-month deal if the new head coach hits a series of performance targets.
Sportsmail can reveal that the contract Tuch… [+2168 chars]

articles.author: SunSport Reporters
articles.title: 7am Chelsea transfer news LIVE: Gilmour to STAY, Lampard ‘feud with Cech’, Haaland LATEST, Dembele int - The Sun
articles.content:
